frontmatter.title: DeepSeek and Ollama: Running LLMs locally with the power of your GPU
frontmatter.description: Running powerful AI models like DeepSeek locally has never been easier, thanks to Ollama. Whether you're a developer, researcher, or AI enthusiast, this guide will guide you through the steps to get started and help you choose the right DeepSeek model for your needs.
